summary: A team of archaeologists in Mexico encounter an amorphous, blob-like monster that appears to be connected with the collapse of the Mayan civilization.

director: Directors: Riccardo Freda (as Robert Hamton), Mario Bava (uncredited)
title: Caltiki, el monstruo inmortal
